abilityEffect: Once during your turn, when you play Flareon ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

effect.en: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Flareon ex by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Flareon ex does 10 damage to itself.
